SEARCH
Package com.app.repository.impl

Class PreferencesRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.repository.impl.PreferencesRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PreferencesRepository, Repository<Long,String>
@Component public class PreferencesRepositoryImpl extends Object implements PreferencesRepository
Implementation of the PreferencesRepository interface that provides access to preference data.

This class loads preferences data from a file using the Load interface, parses it using a LineParser, and validates it using a Validator.

  • Constructor Details

    • PreferencesRepositoryImpl

      public PreferencesRepositoryImpl(@Value("${preferencesFilename:preferences.txt}") String preferencesFilename, Load<Long,String> load, LineParser<Long,String> lineParser, Validator<Map<Long,String>> preferencesValidator)
      Constructs a PreferencesRepositoryImpl with the specified file name, loader, parser, and validator.
      Parameters:
      preferencesFilename - the name of the file containing preferences data
      load - the Load implementation used to read the preferences data from the file
      lineParser - the LineParser implementation used to parse the preferences data
      preferencesValidator - the Validator implementation used to validate the parsed preferences data

      public boolean containId(Long id)
      Checks if a preference with the specified ID exists.
      Specified by:
      containId in interface PreferencesRepository
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the preference to check
      Returns:
      true if the preference exists, false otherwise

    • getAll

      public Map<Long,String> getAll()
      Retrieves all preferences.
      Specified by:
      getAll in interface Repository<Long,String>
      Returns:
      a map containing all preferences, with the preference ID as the key and the preference name as the value

      public String getById(Long id)
      Retrieves a preference by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getById in interface Repository<Long,String>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the preference to retrieve
      Returns:

      Throws:
